name: LightStream Battle Royale
description:
LightStream Battle Royale is a death match with 2-4 players in a top down shooter-style game.

In the field you can collect weapons and potions with battling out other player to the DEATH.

Mechanics:

Shooting - shooting in the game is auto aim whenever any player is the nearest and determine by range in every guns.
Dodging - dodge will provides frame of invincibility.
Seeker - It will find the nearest player and show you the direction.

The goal of the game is to the last man standing, good luck and have fun.
